name: ChordWizard Style
summary: A CWY file contains a song style used by Songtrix, a music learning and creating application. It stores song settings for the volume, tempo, melody, rhythm, bass, drums, and riff levels. Default song styles include Blues, Country, Disco, Funk, Techno, and Swing. CWY files can be uploaded to the ChordWizard network and shared with other members.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
